projects.name: Cinema Plus (Movie App)
projects.description: A Cinema Plus is a movie application project on JavaScript HTML and CSS. This is a project I created for the ITI - Intensive Code Camp (ICC) program Scholarship. It is a web app that allows users to browse, search, bookmark and movies, series and TV shows. I used only CSS3, HTML5 and JavaScript to build this app, without any frameworks or libraries. The app uses the TMDB API to fetch and display movies, series and TV shows.

projects.name: Landing Page
projects.description: I was asked to create a landing page, I was given a template as a Figma file and I converted it to html and css
